name: Woodland Chasers (Demo 1.0)
description:
A prankster witch is flying around with her newly learned flight spell, and her angry friends are chasing her around to stop her.

To start playing the demo, pick an element, pick a level, and Fly!

Controls: Hold left click to rise (alternative: left ctrl), release to go down. Press 'S' key to dive down and shoot, consuming mana.

This demo has all the features of the full game, except that the character is capped at level 10 and all shop items are capped at level 5.

What's new (1.0):
Visual

  • Improved particles
  • Added backgrounds for different levels
  • General UI improvements
  • Added credits page
  • Added pictures as achievement rewards
  • Added sound effects

Fixes

  • Fixed a faulty achievement.
  • Reinstated the screen resolution dialog to hopefully remedy problems with cut off game screen on certain computers

Gameplay and Balance

  • Added special attacks for most enemies
  • All stages now have their own obstacle sets
  • Final level has a boss battle at the end

For more information, visit the fanpage at https://www.facebook.com/Woodl...
